title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Park City, Utah
content:
Support us! BikeRumor may earn a small commission from affiliate links in this article. Learn more.

Photo submitted by Tom LeRoy, “I hadn’t seen my son in 9 months so we were super excited to meet in Park City to hang out and ride some gravel…which almost didn’t happen as he had a catastrophic bottom bracket failure that wasn’t fixed until the night before he had to leave Wyoming.  This pic is from a rail/trail that heads north out of Park City, Utah. ”

We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.
author: Kristi Benedict
